(fn anagrams [words]
  (letfn [(sort-str [s]
            (apply str (sort (seq s))))
          (get-values-from-map [m]
            (set (filter #(> (count %) 1) (vals m))))]
    (->>
      words
      (reduce (fn [a word]
                (let [sorted-word (sort-str word)
                      anagrams (or (a sorted-word) #{})]
                  (assoc a sorted-word (conj anagrams word))))
              {})
      get-values-from-map)))

(fn [xs]
  (->>
   xs
   (group-by (comp frequencies seq))
   (filter #(> (count (second %)) 1))
   (map (comp set second))
   set))

(fn [words]
  (letfn [(rotate
           [coll]
           (conj (subvec coll 1) (first coll)))
          (rotations
           [coll]
           (take (count coll) (iterate rotate coll)))
          (rotate-and-join
           [coll idx]
           (let [[l r] (split-at idx coll)]
            (map #(concat % r) (rotations (vec l)))))
          (permutations
           [coll]
           (reduce 
            (fn [res idx] 
              (mapcat rotate-and-join res (repeat idx)))
            [coll]
            (range (count coll) 1 -1)))]
     (loop [words (set words)
            result #{}]
       (let [word  (first words)
             chs   (seq word)
             perms (into #{} (map (partial apply str) (permutations chs)))]
         (if (empty? words)
           (clojure.set/select #(> (count %) 1) result)
           (recur
            (clojure.set/difference words perms #{word})
            (conj result (clojure.set/intersection perms words))))))))

(fn [[& ws]]
  (let [ws (filter (fn [[k l]] (> (count l) 1))
                   (seq (group-by (fn [[k w]] k)
                                  (map #(list (sort (seq %1)) %1) ws))))]
    (loop [[k l :as w] (first ws) ws (next ws) a #{}]
      (if w
        (recur (first ws) (next ws) 
               (conj a (set (map #(second %) l))))
        a))))

(fn [input] (set
              (map set
                   (filter #(< 1 (count %))
                           (reduce (fn [anagrams value]
                                     (let [has-match (-> (filter #(= (into #{} %)
                                                                     (into #{} value))
                                                                 (map first anagrams))
                                                         empty?
                                                         not)]
                                       (if has-match
                                         (map (fn [a]
                                                (let [match? (= (into #{} (first a))
                                                                (into #{} value))]
                                                  (if match? (conj a value)
                                                             a))) anagrams)
                                         (conj anagrams (list value)))))
                                   '() input)))))

(fn [v]
  (let [words
        (zipmap (map #(re-seq #"." %) v) (map #(conj #{} %) v))
        matcher
        (fn [w]
          (loop [res {} to-merge w]
            (if (empty? to-merge)
              res
              (let [{k 0, v 1} (first to-merge)] 
                   (recur
                    (merge-with
                     (fn [l r] (clojure.set/union l r))
                     res
                     (hash-map (sort k) v))
                    (rest to-merge)))
              ))
          
          )]
         (set (filter #(< 1 (count %))(vals (matcher words))) ) ))

(let [anagram?
      (fn [x y]
        (= (frequencies x) (frequencies y)))
      anagram-finder
      (fn [words]
        (into #{}
              (keep (fn [x]
                      (let [anagrams (into #{x}
                                           (filter (fn [y] (anagram? x y))
                                                   words))]
                        (when (< 1 (count anagrams))
                          anagrams)))
                    words)))]
  anagram-finder)

(fn [v] (letfn
   [(read-word
     [m v]
     (if (empty? v)
       #(get-result m)
       #(add-word
         m (rest v) (first v))))
    (add-word
     [m v w]
     (let [k (apply str
                    (sort w))
           s (get m k #{})]
       #(read-word
         (assoc m k (conj s w))
         v)))
    (get-result
     [m]
     (set
      (filter #(> (count %) 1)
       (vals m))))]
   (trampoline read-word {} v)))

                    (filter (partial is-ana-of? word) word-list))
        relevant-list (filter #(> (count %) 1) full-list)]
    (set (map set relevant-list))))

  (map second
  (reduce (fn [m s]

(fn [words]
  (loop [acc #{} [word & words] words]
    (if (seq words)
      (let [anas (set (filter #(= (set word) (set %)) words))
            anas (conj anas word)
            is-sub? (reduce #(or %1 (clojure.set/subset? anas %2)) false acc)
            wo-subs (set (remove #(clojure.set/subset? % anas) acc))
            wo-subs (set (remove #(clojure.set/subset? % anas) (reverse wo-subs)))]
        (if (or is-sub? (< (count anas) 2))
          (recur acc words)
          (recur (conj wo-subs anas) words)))
      acc)))

(fn [s]
  (loop [out #{}, outi #{}, i 0, j 0] 
    (cond
      (= i (count s)) out
      (= j (count s)) (recur (if (> (count outi) 1) (conj out outi) out) #{} (inc i) 0)
      :else (let [si (nth s i), sj (nth s j)]
        (recur out 
               (if (some #(= % 1) (vals (frequencies (concat si sj)))) 
                 outi 
                 (conj outi sj)) 
               i 
               (inc j))
))))

(fn anag [coll]
  (loop [c coll r {}]
    (let [v (first c) k (sort (list* v))]
      (if (nil? c)
        (set (map #(set (second %)) (filter #(< 1 (count (second %))) r)))
        (if (r k)
          (recur (next c) (update-in r [k] conj v))
          (recur (next c) (assoc r k [v])))))))

(fn agrams
  [words]
  (loop [words words
         charsets {}]
    (if (empty? words)
      (into #{} (filter #(> (count %) 1) (vals charsets)))
      (let [word (first words)
            charset (into #{} word)
            getset (charsets charset)
            oldset (if (nil? getset)
                     #{}
                     getset)]
        (recur (rest words)
               (assoc charsets charset
                      (conj oldset word)))))))

(fn anagrams [words]
  (loop [words words
         result {}]
    (if (empty? words)
      (set (filter #(> (count %) 1) (vals result)))
      (let [[head & tail] words
            key (frequencies head)]
        (recur tail (assoc result key (set (conj (result key) head))))))))

   (let [find-anagrams (fn find-anagrams [word]
                         (let [is-anagram (fn [a]
                                            (= (sort word) (sort a)))]
                           (set (filter is-anagram all-words))))]
     (set (filter (fn [x] (> (count x) 1)) (map find-anagrams all-words)))))

(fn [words]
  (let [anagram-tester (fn [x]
                         (fn [y] (loop [word1 x word2 y]
    (cond (not= (count word1) (count word2)) false
          (and (zero? (count word1)) (zero? (count word2))) true
          ;((< (.indexOf word2 (str (.charAt word1 0))) 0)) false
          :else (recur (subs word1 1) (clojure.string/replace-first word2 (.charAt word1 0) #""))))))]
    (loop [result #{} w words]
      (if (not (seq w))
        result
        (recur (if (empty? (filter (anagram-tester (first w)) (rest w)) ) 
                 (set result) 
                 (conj result (set (filter (anagram-tester (first w)) w)))) 
               (if (empty? (filter (anagram-tester (first w)) (rest w)) )
                 (rest w)
                 (remove (anagram-tester (first w)) w)))))))

(fn anagrams
  [in]
  (set (remove #(empty? %) 
    (for [x in] 
         (apply clojure.set/union (for [y (remove #(= x %) in) :when (= (apply str (sort x)) (apply str (sort y)))] 
            #{x y}))))))

#(reduce
  (fn [s g] (if (> (count g) 1) (conj s (set g)) s))
  #{}
  (vals (group-by sort %)))

(fn [sq]
  (loop [sq-it sq
         ret-it #{}]
    (if (empty? sq-it)
      ret-it
      (letfn [(anagram? [s]
                        (= (sort (first sq-it))
                           (sort s)))]
        (recur (remove anagram? sq-it)
               (let [new-set (into #{} (filter anagram? sq-it))]
                 (if (> (count new-set)
                        1)
                   (conj ret-it new-set)
                   ret-it)))))))

(fn anagrams [words]
        (loop [freqs (reduce #(conj %1 (frequencies %2)) [] words)
               words-rem words
               result #{}]
          (if (empty? words-rem)
            result
            (let [x-anagrams (set (filter #(= (first freqs) (frequencies %)) words-rem))]
              (if (> (count x-anagrams) 1)
                (recur (rest freqs) (remove #(contains? x-anagrams %) words-rem) (conj result x-anagrams))
                (recur (rest freqs) (remove #(contains? x-anagrams %) words-rem) result))))))

(fn [words]
  (letfn [(analyze [word]
                   (reduce #(merge-with + %1 {%2 1}) {} word))]
    (loop [words words
           anagrams {}]
      (if (empty? words)
        (set (filter #(> (count %) 1) (vals anagrams)))
        (let [w (first words)
              a (analyze w)]
          (recur (rest words) (merge-with clojure.set/union anagrams {a #{w}})))))))

(fn f [v]
  (into #{} (filter #(> (count %) 1) (for
    [[kk vv] (group-by (fn ff [b] (group-by (fn fff[a] a) b)) v)]
              (into #{} vv)))))

(fn [coll]
  (letfn [(map-em [coll]
                  (loop [c coll
                         o {}]
                    (if (empty? c)
                      o
                      (let [f (first c)]
                        (recur (rest c) (conj o {f, (frequencies (clojure.string/split f  #""))}))))))
          (group-em [coll]
                    (group-by #(sort (keys (val %))) (map-em coll)))
          (filter-em [coll]
                     (filter #(if (> (count %) 1) %) (vals (group-em coll))))
          (return-em [coll]
                     (set
                      (for [x (filter-em coll)]
                        (set (map first x)))))]
    (return-em coll)))

(fn anagram [words]
  (let [unique (->> words (map set) set)]
  	(->> unique
      (map (fn [cs] (->> words (filter #(= cs (set %))) set)))
      (filter #(> (count %) 1))
      set)))

(fn [words]
   (->> (for [x words, y words
              :let [anagram? #(= (set %1) (set %2))]
              :when (not= x y)
              :when (anagram? x y)]
          {x #{x y}})
        (apply merge-with clojure.set/union)
        vals
        set))

(fn [wl]
  (let [m (reduce
           (fn [s x] (update-in s [(sort x)] conj x)) {} wl)]
    (set (filter #(> (count %) 1) (map set  (vals  m))))
    ))

(fn [ss]
  (letfn [(ag [w1 w2] (= (set w1) (set w2)))
          (itr [w s] 
               {:a (set (cons w (filter #(ag w %) s)))
                :r (remove #(ag w %) s)})]
         (loop [[h & t] ss res #{}]
           (if (nil? h)
             (set (filter #(> (count %) 1) res))
             (let [{a :a r :r} (itr h t)]
               (recur r (conj res a)))))))

(fn [coll]
   (
    (comp set (partial filter #(> (count %) 1)) (partial map set) vals)
    (reduce (fn [m s]
              (let [k (group-by identity (seq s))
                    v (m k)]
                (conj m {k (conj v s)}))) {} coll)))

(fn anagram-finder [coll]
  (let [angarams (map (fn [x]
                        [(sort x) x]) coll)
        values (vals (group-by #(first %) angarams))]
    (into #{} (filter #(< 1 (count %)) (map (fn [group]
                                              (into #{} (map second group))) values)))
    ))

(fn [v]
  ( let [x  (reduce #(conj %1 (clojure.string/split %2 #"")) [] v) ]
(let [y (reduce #(conj %1 (sort %2)) [] x) ]
  (into #{}
  (remove #(= (count %) 1)
    (loop [c 0 s #{}]
      (if (= c (count v)) s
        (recur (inc c) (conj s 
          (loop [c1 0 s1 #{} ]
            (if (= c1 (count v))
              s1
              (recur (inc c1)
                (if (= (nth y c) (nth y c1))
                  (conj s1 (nth v c1))
                    s1
)))))))))))))

(fn [words]
  (loop [acc #{} [w & ws :as coll] words]
    (if (empty? coll) acc
      (let [s (set w)
            a-grams (into #{} (for [i ws :when (= s (set i))] i))          
            left-overs (filter #(not (contains? a-grams %)) ws)]
        (if (empty? a-grams)
          (recur acc left-overs)
          (recur (conj acc (conj a-grams w)) left-overs))))))

(fn [w]
  (->> w
  (map sort)
  (interleave (range))
  (partition 2)
  (group-by last) 
  (filter #(< 1 (count (last %))))
  (map #(map first (last %)))
  (map (fn [i] (set (map #(get w %) i))))
  (set)
  )
)

(fn p77 [words]
  (apply hash-set (map #(reduce conj #{} %) (filter #(< 1 (count %)) (vals (group-by (comp sort char-array) words))))))

(fn [words]
  (loop [comparitor (first words) remaining (set words) sets #{}]
    (if (empty? remaining)
      sets
      (let [anagrams (set (filter #(= (sort comparitor) (sort %)) remaining))
            else (clojure.set/difference remaining anagrams)]
        (recur (first else) else (if (< 1 (count anagrams)) (conj sets anagrams) sets))))))

(fn [col]
     (let [groups (group-by #(sort (apply vector %)) col)
           val-col (vals groups)]
       (prn val-col)
       (reduce #(if (< 1 (count %2)) (conj % (set %2)) %) #{} val-col)))

(fn [v]
  (set (filter (fn [s] (> (count s) 1)) (map
   (fn [l] (set (flatten (map last l))))
   (map last (group-by first (map vector (map sort v) v)))))))

(fn anagram-finder [words]
  (letfn [(is-anagram [w1 w2] (= (sort w1) (sort w2)))
          (anagram-find [w words] (filter
                                   #(is-anagram w %)
                                   words))]
  (set (filter #(> (count %) 1) (map #(set (anagram-find % words)) words)))))

(fn [dic]

(fn [slst]
    (let [m (atom {})
          madd (fn [y] (let [x (set (seq y))]
                         (if (contains? @m x)
                           (swap! m #(conj % [x (conj (get % x) y)]))
                           (swap! m #(conj % [x #{y}])))))]
      (doseq [x slst]
        (madd x))
      (set (for [[k v] @m :when (< 1 (count v))]v))))

(fn [v-of-words]
  (letfn [(is-palindrome [l-word r-word]
            (= (dissoc (frequencies l-word) \space)
               (dissoc (frequencies r-word) \space)))
          (equiv-class [rel a-col]
            (loop [s (seq a-col) acc #{}]
              (if (not s)
                acc
                (let [f (first s)
                      r (rest s)
                      m (set (filter #(rel f %) r))
                      n (filter #(not (rel f %)) r)]
                  (recur (seq n) (conj acc (conj m f)))))))]
    (reduce #(if (> (count %2) 1) (conj %1 %2) %1) #{} (equiv-class is-palindrome v-of-words))))

(fn ann-finder [seqz] 
  (let [
        find-anagrams (fn [ys]
                        (if (next ys)
                          (let [
                                fs (first ys)
                                rst (rest ys)
                                sorted-fst (sort (seq fs))
                                answer (filter #(= sorted-fst (sort (seq %1))) rst)
                                ]
                            (if (seq answer) (into #{}(cons fs answer))
                                              #{}))
                          #{}
                          ))
        
        cts? (fn [set-list item] (filter #(contains? % item) set-list)) 
        
        helper (fn helper [input setts]
                 (if (seq input)
                       (if (not= (count (cts? setts (first input))) 0) (helper (rest input) setts)
                                                                       (helper (rest input) (cons (find-anagrams input) setts)))
                     setts))
        
        ]
    (into #{} (filter #(not (empty? %)) (helper seqz (seq [#{}]))))
  ))

(fn find-anagrams [s]
  (letfn [(find-matches [word [compare-to & rest]]
            (when (and word compare-to)
              (if (and (= (count word) (count compare-to))
                       (every? true? (map (fn [c] (.contains word (str c))) compare-to)))
                (clojure.set/union #{word compare-to} (find-matches word rest))
                (find-matches word rest))))]
    (loop [result #{} todo s]
      (if (seq todo)
        (let [current (find-matches (first todo) (rest todo))
              rest (drop 1 todo)]
          (if (and current (not-any? (fn [x] (clojure.set/subset? current x)) result))
            (recur (cons current result) rest)
            (recur result rest)))
        (into #{} result)))))

(fn anagramFinder [words]
  (letfn [(chargroup [word] (group-by identity word))
          (charmap [word] (zipmap (keys (chargroup word)) (map #(count (val %)) (chargroup word))))
          (wordcharmap [coll] (zipmap coll (map charmap coll)))
          (wordcharmapgroup [coll] (group-by #(get (wordcharmap coll) %) coll))
          (wordsets [wordcmg] (map #(into #{} (val %)) (wordcharmapgroup wordcmg)))]
    (into #{} (filter #(< 1 (count %)) (wordsets words)))))

;; now implement the solution using recursion(playing around)
#_(fn anagram-finder
  ([words] (anagram-finder words words words [#{}]))
  ([[head & tail] next-comp-words init-words words-acc]
     (if (empty? next-comp-words)  ;; rest returns a lazyseq and empty else(don't check for nil?)
       (set
           (filter #(> (count %) 1) words-acc))
       (if (nil? head)
         (recur init-words (rest next-comp-words) init-words (conj words-acc #{}))  ;; rebind initial words for next checked word
         (if (= (sort head) (sort (first next-comp-words)))
           (recur tail next-comp-words init-words (conj (vec (butlast words-acc)) (conj (last words-acc) head)))
           (recur tail next-comp-words init-words words-acc))))))

(fn [coll]
  (letfn [(count-x [x coll]
            (count (filter #(= x %) coll)))
          (count-same [x a b]
            (= (count-x x a) (count-x x a)))
          (max-on-len [a b]
            (if (> (count a) (count b))
              a
              b))
          (anagram? [a b]
            (every? true?
                    (map #(= (count-x % a) (count-x % b)) (max-on-len a b))))
          (filter-with [f coll]
            (reduce
             (fn [[coll-true coll-false] x]
               (if (f x)
                 [(conj coll-true x) coll-false]
                 [coll-true (conj coll-false x)]))
             [[] []]
             coll))]
    (loop [acc #{} tcoll coll]
      (if (empty? tcoll)
        acc
        (let [[coll-true coll-false] (filter-with #(anagram? % (first tcoll)) tcoll)]
          (if (> (count coll-true) 1)
            (recur (conj acc (set coll-true)) coll-false)
            (recur acc coll-false)))))))

  )))

(fn anagram [coll]
  (letfn [(seq2map [coll]
            (apply 
              (partial conj {}) 
              (map #(conj [] %1 %2) (range (count coll)) coll)))
          (str2seq [coll]
            (let [k (map key coll)
                  v (map (comp sort seq val) coll)]
              (apply (partial conj {}) (map #(conj [] %1 %2) k v))))  
          (idc [coll]
            (let [c 
                  (for [i (range (count coll))] 
                    (disj 
                      (apply (partial conj #{} i) (for [j (range (count coll))] (if (= (coll i) (coll j)) j))) 
                      nil))]
              (filter #(not= 1 (count %)) c)))]
    (let [ks (seq2map coll)
          kn (apply 
               (partial conj #{}) 
               ((comp idc str2seq seq2map) coll))
          rs (for [c kn] (map #(ks %) c))]
      (apply (partial conj #{}) (map set rs)) )))

                 (if (= word1 word2)

  (loop [remaining coll
         anagrams #{}]
    (cond
      (empty? remaining) anagrams
      (empty? (filter (helper (first remaining)) coll)) (recur (rest remaining) anagrams)
      :else (recur (rest remaining) (conj anagrams (conj (set (filter (helper (first remaining)) coll)) (first remaining)))
    )))))

  (->>
   
   ;; obtain char map for each word
   (map (fn [w] 
          (let [char-count-map (reduce

                                {}
                                (clojure.string/split w #""))]

(fn anagram-finder
  ([m]
   (anagram-finder m #{}))
  ([m list]
   (anagram-finder
    m
    (filter
     (fn [el]
       (#(loop [base %
                subs %2]
           (if (and (empty? base) (empty? subs))
             true
             (if (or (empty? base) (empty? subs))
               false
               (recur (clojure.string/replace-first base (first subs) "") (next subs)))
             ))
        (first m) el)) m) list))
  ([m m1 list]
   (let [left (keys (filter #(= (second %) 1) (apply merge-with - (map frequencies [m m1]))))
         striked (not (empty? m1))]
     (if striked
       (let [newlist (into #{} (filter next (conj list (into #{} m1))))]
         (if (empty? left)
           newlist
           (anagram-finder left newlist)))
       (let [left (next left)]
         (if (empty? left)
           list
           (anagram-finder left list)))))))

						(recur (rest coll1) (rest coll2))
					:else false))
			(anagram? [word1 word2] (contains-same? (sort (into [] word1)) (sort (into [] word2))))]
	 (into #{} 
	 	(filter 
	 		#(> (count %) 1) 
	 			(map (fn [word] 
		 				(reduce (fn [rs new-word] 
		 							(if (anagram? new-word word) 
		 								(conj rs new-word)
		 								rs))
								#{}
								word-list)) 
	 				 word-list)))))

                                                    (= (sort (seq s1)) (sort (seq s2))))]
                                     (loop [c c, result #{}]
                                       (cond (empty? c) result
                                             true (recur (filter #(not (anagram? (first c) %)) c) (into result (list (set (filter #(anagram? (first c) %) c)))))))))))

(fn anagrams [words]
    (->> words
         (reduce (fn [acc w]
                   (let [k (sort w)]
                     (assoc acc k (conj (get acc k #{}) w))))
                 {})
         vals
         (filter #(>= (count %) 2))
         set))

(fn [word-lst]
    (loop [anagrams {} words word-lst]
    (if (empty? words)
        (set (filter (fn [x] (> (count x) 1)) (vals anagrams)))
    (let [current-word (first words) normalized (sort current-word)]
    (if (contains? anagrams normalized)
    (let [group (get anagrams normalized)]
        (let [new-group (conj group current-word)]
            (recur (assoc anagrams normalized new-group) (rest words))))
    (recur (assoc anagrams normalized #{current-word}) (rest words)))))))

(fn anagrams [words]
  (let [word-groups (vals (group-by #(sort %) words))
        match-groups (filter #(> (count %) 1) word-groups)
        match-sets (map #(set %) match-groups)]
    (set match-sets)))

(fn [s]
		(loop [lst s newmap {}]
			(if (empty? lst)
				(loop [l (map val newmap) m #{}]
					(if (empty? l)
						m
						(if (< 1 (count (first l)))
							(recur (rest l) (conj m (first l)))
							(recur (rest l) m))))				
				(if (contains? newmap (sort (clojure.string/split (first lst) #"")))
					(recur (rest lst) (assoc newmap (sort (clojure.string/split (first lst) #"")) (conj (get newmap (sort (clojure.string/split (first lst) #""))) (first lst))))
					(recur (rest lst) (assoc newmap (sort (clojure.string/split (first lst) #"")) (hash-set (first lst))))))))

(fn [ws] (letfn [(anogram [a b] (and (= (count a) (count b))
                                            (every? (fn [x] (= (count (filter #(= x %) a))
                                                               (count (filter #(= x %) b)))) a)))]
                  (set (filter #(> (count %) 1) 
                          (reduce (fn [s w] (conj s (set (get (group-by #(anogram w %) ws) true))))
                                  #{}
                                  ws)))))

(fn [v]
   (let [v (map #(vector % (set (seq %))) v)
         k (into #{} (map second v))
         r (map (fn [i] (filter #(= i (second %)) v)) k)
         r (map #(set (map first %)) r)
         r (remove #(= 1 (count %)) r)]
     (set r)))

(fn fun [y] 
  (if (not= y (empty y)) 
    (let [x #(into #{} %)
          z (x (first y)) 
          w (into #{} (filter #(= z (x %)) y) ) 
          q (filter #(not= z (x %)) y)] 
      (into (if (> (count w) 1) #{w} #{}) (fun q) ))))

(fn [xs]
  (letfn [(anagram? [x y] (= (sort x) (sort y)))]
    (loop [acc #{}, words (set xs)]
      (if (empty? words)
        acc
        (let [next (set (filter (partial anagram? (first words)) words))]
          (recur (if (> (count next) 1) (conj acc next) acc)
                 (clojure.set/difference words next)))))))

(fn anagrams
  [words]
  (let [group-of-words
        (reduce (fn [out, [key, val]]
                  (assoc out key (conj (out key) val)))
              {}
              (for [word words]
                [(set word) word]))]
    (set (for [[k,v] group-of-words :when (> (count v) 1)] (set v)))))

(fn [xs]

    (loop [n xs a #{}]
      (if (seq n)
        (recur (rest n) (conj a (f (first n))))
        (set (filter #(> (count %) 1) a))))))

                 (filter #(> (count %) 1)))))

    (merge s v)) 
    #{}          
    (filter
      (fn [a] (let [[x y] a] (> (count y) 1))) ;; only keeping the entries with 2 or more anagrams
        (reduce #(merge-with (fn [x y] (clojure.set/union x y)) % {(sort %2) #{%2}}) {} xs))))

(fn [input & found]
  (letfn [(std [word] (sort (seq word)))
          (amatch? [aword bword] (= (std aword) (std bword)))
          (anagrams [f r] (filter (partial amatch? f) r))
          (not_ana [f r] (filter (comp not (partial amatch? f)) r))]
    (loop [wordlist input
          found #{}]
      (let [word (first wordlist)
            cands (rest wordlist)]
        (if (empty? wordlist)
          found
          (if (empty? (anagrams word cands))
            (recur cands found)
            (recur (vec (not_ana word cands))
                  (conj found (set (cons word (anagrams word cands)))))))))))

(fn anagram-finder [words]
  (let [anagram? (fn [word1 word2]
                   (let [sort-seq (comp sort seq)]
                     (= (sort-seq word1) (sort-seq word2))))]
    (loop [acc []
           [first-word & rest-words :as all-words] words]
      (if (empty? all-words)
        (set acc)
        (let [anagrams (reduce (fn [accu word]
                                 (if (anagram? first-word word)
                                   (conj accu word)
                                   accu))
                               #{first-word}
                               rest-words)]
          (if (> (count anagrams) 1)
            (recur (conj acc anagrams) (remove 
                                        #(anagram? first-word %) rest-words))
            (recur acc rest-words)))))))

(fn f [i [h & t :as s]]
  (if (nil? h)
      i
      (let [fit (set (filter #(= (set h) (set %)) t))]
        (recur (if (seq fit) `#{~@i #{~@fit ~h}} i)
          (vec (clojure.set/difference (set t) fit))))))
 #{}

      (set (map set

          (filter #(> (count %) 1)
            (vals (group-by :key
              (map

                words))))))))
      ]
  (unify words key1)))

(fn [w]
  (loop [s w r #{}]
	   (if (empty? s) r
         (let [n (set (filter #((fn [s t] (= (sort s) (sort t))) % (first s)) 
                              s))]
           (recur (remove n s)
                  (if (> (count n) 1)

(fn [c]
  (letfn [
         (perm [s r] (if (first s) (mapcat (fn [t] (perm  (remove (fn [t1] (= t1 t)) s) (conj r t))) s) 
             [r]))
             
          (wordPerm [ w ]
            (let [w1 (apply vector (seq w)) 
                  p (perm (range (count w)) []) ]
                  (set (map #(apply str (map (fn [i] (w1 i)) %)) p))))

          (singleSet [item pm xs]
                     (let [others (set (for [i xs :when (contains? pm i)] i))]
                       (if (empty? others) #{}
                           (conj others item))))]
    (loop [ [f & xs] c re #{}]
      (if (not f) re
        (let [pm (wordPerm f)
              ss (singleSet f pm xs)]
          (recur (filter #(not (contains? ss %)) xs) (if (empty? ss) re (conj re ss))))))))

(fn anagrammer [word-vec]
  ((fn [ana word-set]
     (prn ana word-set)
     (if (seq word-set)
       (let [w (first word-set)
             freqs (frequencies w)
             matches (filter #(= (frequencies %) freqs) (rest word-set))
             matcheset (set matches)]
         (if (seq matches)
           (recur (conj ana (set (conj matches w)))
                  (->> word-set
                    rest
                    (filter #(not (contains? matcheset %)))
                    set))
           (recur ana (set (rest word-set)))))
       ana)) #{} (set word-vec)))

(fn find-anagrams
  [words]
  (let [anagram? (fn [a b]
                   (and (not (= a b))
                        (= (group-by char a) (group-by char b))))]
    (into #{} (vals (reduce
                     (fn [anagrams word-a]
                       (reduce (fn [anagrams word-b]
                                 (if (anagram? word-a word-b)
                                   (update-in anagrams [(group-by char word-a)] (fnil conj #{}) word-a word-b)
                                   anagrams)) anagrams words))
                     {} words)))))

  P)

(fn [s]
  (let [unique (into #{} s)
        anagram? (fn [a b] (apply = (map frequencies [a b])))
        matches (map (fn [e]
                       (let [anagrams (->> (disj unique e)
                                           (filter #(anagram? % e)))]
                         (-> (into #{} anagrams)
                             (conj e))))
                     s)]
    (->> (filter #(> (count %) 1) matches)
         (into #{}))))

(fn [words]
   (let [f (fn [rmap word] 
             (if-let [anagrams (get rmap (set word))]
               (assoc rmap (set word) (conj anagrams word))
               (assoc rmap (set word) (sorted-set word))))
         >1? #(> (count (second %)) 1)]
  (->> words
       (reduce f {})
       (filter >1?)
       vals
       set)))

(fn prob-0077
  [words]

  (let [freq-dec (fn freq-dec
        [sm k]
        {:pre [(not (nil? (sm k)))]}
        
        (if (nil? (sm k))
          (throw (AssertionError. "(not (nil? (mp k)))")))
          
        (let [cnt (dec (sm k 0))]
          (if-not (pos? cnt)
            (dissoc sm k)
            (merge sm {k cnt}))))
      
      freq-cnt (fn freq-cnt
        [sm]
        (apply + (vals sm)))
      
      perm-sorted-map (fn perm-sorted-map
        [sm]
        (if (<= (freq-cnt sm) 1)
          (list (keys sm))
          (for [k (keys sm)
                rest (perm-sorted-map (freq-dec sm k))]
            (cons k rest))))
      
      permutations (fn permutations
        [xs]
          (let [perms (perm-sorted-map (into (sorted-map) (frequencies (seq xs))))]
            (apply sorted-set (map #(apply str %) perms))))
    ]

  (let [srt-wrds    (apply sorted-set words)
        to-uq-perms #(clojure.set/intersection (permutations %) srt-wrds)
        to-uq-mults #(>= (count %) 2) ]
    
    (set (distinct (filter to-uq-mults (map to-uq-perms srt-wrds)))))))

#(letfn [(groupwords [wordsets word]
           (loop [input wordsets, output #{}]
             (cond
               (empty? input)
                 (conj output #{word})
               (= (set word) (set (first (first input))))
                 (conj
                   (clojure.set/union (rest input) output)
                   (conj (first input) word))
               :else

  (->> %

(fn anagrams [coll]
  (letfn [(permutation? [s1 s2]
            (let [n (count s2)]
              (cond
               (and (empty? s1) (empty? s2))
               true
               (some #{(first s1)} s2)
               (recur (rest s1)
                      (rest (take n (drop-while #(not= (first s1) %) (cycle s2)))))
               :else false)))
          (find-anagrams [coll]
            (for [s coll]
              (set (filter #(permutation? % s) coll))))]
    (into #{} (filter #(> (count %) 1) (find-anagrams coll)))))

(fn [lst]
  (letfn [(anagram? [anagram word]
            (= (into #{} word) (into #{} anagram)))
          (find-anagrams [word]
            (into #{} (filter (partial anagram? word) lst)))
          (maybe-conj [result anagrams]
            (if (> (count anagrams) 1)
              (conj result anagrams)
              result))]
    (loop [[word & rest] lst
           result #{}]
      (let [anagrams (find-anagrams word)
            new-result (maybe-conj result anagrams)]
        (if rest
          (recur rest new-result)
          new-result)))))

(fn solve [words]
  (let [word-to-ds (fn [word]
                     {:key (apply str (sort (seq word))) :original word})
        group-anagrams (fn [words]
                         (let [groups (group-by :key (map word-to-ds words))]
                           (map (fn [[k v]] (into #{} (map :original v))) groups)))]
    (into #{} (filter #(> (count %) 1) (group-anagrams words)))))

(let [stringify (partial apply str)]
    (letfn [(kw-sorted [s]
              (-> s sort stringify keyword))
            (pairs [col]
              (map vector (map kw-sorted col) col))
            (conj-u [col [k v]]
              (if-let [e (k col)]
                (assoc col k (conj e v))
                (assoc col k #{v})))]
      (fn [col] (into #{} (filter #(< 1 (count %)) (vals (reduce conj-u {} (pairs col))))))))

(fn [coll]
  (let [gen-ana-id        (fn [word]
                              (->> word sort (apply str)))
        group-ana         (fn [words]
                              (group-by gen-ana-id words))
                              
        many-ana?         (fn [[_, words]] 
                              (->> words count dec zero? not))
        remove-single-ana (fn [coll]
                              (filter many-ana? coll))
                              
        ap-set            (fn [coll] (apply hash-set coll))
                              
        to-set            (fn [coll]
                              (ap-set (map (fn [[_, words]] (ap-set words)) coll)))]
    (->> coll group-ana remove-single-ana to-set)))

             (assoc sets id (conj (get sets id #{}) word))))

        vals

(fn anagram- [coll]
  "77. Write a function which finds all the anagrams in a vector of words."
  ;; Works by building a multimap of common anagram -> set of words that generate that anagram                                                                          
  ;; then filtering out any set that doesn't have at least one member.                                                                                                  
  (let [m (reduce #(assoc %1 (sort %2) (conj (get %1 (sort %2) #{}) %2)) {} coll)]

	(set (filter #(>= (count %) 2)
		(set (for [w (range (count words))]
			(set (filter #(not (nil? %))
				(#(for [m (range (count %))]
					(some #{(nth % m)} %2))
				words
				((fn anagram[word]
					(let [letter (map #(str %) word)]
						(map #(apply str %) (filter #(= (count %) (count word)) (distinct (filter #(= (frequencies %) (frequencies letter))
							(apply (fn combi [s1 s2 & args]
								(let [fcp #(for [e1 % e2 %2] [e1 e2]) cp1 (fcp s1 s2)]
									(if (empty? args)
										cp1
										(loop [i 0 res cp1]
											(if (= i (count args))
												res
												(recur (inc i) (map #(apply conj %) (fcp res (nth args i)))))))))
							(take (count word) (cycle [letter])))))))))
				(nth words w))))))))))

(fn [words]
  ;perms is a permutation alg based on backtracking, see above
  (let [perms (fn [l]
                (let [length (count l)
                      swp (fn [v i j] (assoc v i (v j) j (v i)))] ;swaps elements i and j in v
                  (if (= 1 length)
                    [l]
                    (loop [result [l]      ;A list of combinations at the prev layer
                           level  0]       ;This is the depth of the tree
                      (if (= level (- length 1))
                        result
                        (recur (into [] (apply concat  (for [swept (range 0 (count result))]
                                                         (reduce (fn [%1 %2]  (conj %1 (swp (result swept) level %2))) [] (range level length)))))
                               (inc level)))))))]
    (set
      (filter #(> (count %) 1)
        (for [word words]
          (let [perms (map #(apply str %) (perms (into [] word)))]
            (->> (doall (filter #(.contains words (str %)) perms))
                 (set))))))))

(fn anagram-finder
  [coll]
  (let [anagrams? (fn anagrams?
                    [a b]
                    (= (set a) (set b)))]
    (loop [anagrams #{}
           coll coll]
      (if (empty? coll)
        (set (filter #(> (count %) 1) anagrams))
        (let [cur-elem (first coll)
              matching-anagrams (set (filter (partial anagrams? cur-elem) coll))
              non-matching-elems (filter (complement matching-anagrams) coll)
              new-coll (rest coll)]
          (recur (conj anagrams matching-anagrams) non-matching-elems))))))

(fn anabin [xs]
  (letfn [(anagram? [a, b]
                    (= (sort (seq a)) (sort (seq b))))]
    (loop [in xs
           out #{}]
      (if (empty? in)
        out
        (let [f (first in)
              r (rest in)
              anas (filter (partial anagram? f) r)
              nanas (filter #(not (anagram? f %)) r)]
          (recur nanas (if (empty? anas)
                         out
                         (conj out (set (conj anas f))))))))))

(fn f [coll]
  (letfn [(anagrams? [a b] (let [a1 (group-by identity a)
                                 b1 (group-by identity b)]
                             (= a1 b1)))]
    (loop [result #{}, remaining coll]
      (if (seq remaining)
        (let [decided (group-by (partial anagrams? (first remaining))
                                remaining)
              anagrams (into #{} (decided true))
              not-anagrams (decided false)]
          (if (> (count anagrams) 1)
            (recur (conj result anagrams) not-anagrams)
            (recur result (rest not-anagrams))))
        result))))

(fn anagram-finder [words]
  (loop [result #{} [w & ws] words]
    (if-not ws result
               (let [anagrams (set (filter #(= (set %) (set w)) ws))]

                   (recur result ws)
                   (recur (conj result (conj anagrams w)) (remove anagrams ws)))))
    ))

(fn anagrams [col]
  (loop [[word & rest] col
         map {}]
    (if-not (nil? word)
      (let [sorted-word (sort word)]
        (recur rest (if (contains? map sorted-word)
                      (update-in map [sorted-word] conj word)
                      (assoc map sorted-word (conj #{} word)))))
      (set (filter #(> (count %1) 1)(vals map))))))

(fn find-anagrams [words]
  (letfn [
    (prep-word [word] (sort (re-seq #"." word)))
    (anagram? [w1 w2] (= (prep-word w1) (prep-word w2) ))
    (get-anagrams [words]
      (let [s (filter (partial anagram? (first words)) words)]
        (if (empty? s) #{(first words)} (set s))))
    (find-anagrams-acc [col, acc]
      (if (empty? col)
        acc
        (recur (clojure.set/difference (set col) (get-anagrams col))
                (conj acc (get-anagrams col)))))]
    (set (filter #(> (count %) 1) (find-anagrams-acc words [])))))

(fn find-anagrams
  [xs]
  (let [hist (fn [xs f]
  			       (reduce
    			       (fn [acc x]
      			       (let [key (f x)
            			     curr (get acc key)
            			     next (if (nil? curr) 1 (inc curr))]
        		         (assoc acc key next)))
    			      {}
    			      xs))
        grp-by (fn [xs f]
  				       (reduce
    			         (fn [acc x]
      				       (let [key (f x)
                                 values (get acc key)
                                 values (if (nil? values) #{} values)]
        			         (assoc acc key (conj values x))))
    			         {}
    			         xs))]
    (->> (grp-by xs #(hist % (fn [ch] ch)))
         vals
         (filter #(> (count %) 1))
         set)))

(fn f [s]
    (if (empty? s)
      #{}
      (let [fst (first s)
            ang? #(= (sort fst) (sort %))
            angs (filter ang? (rest s))
            not-angs (filter (complement ang?) (rest s))]
        (if (empty? angs)
          (f not-angs)
          (conj (f not-angs) (set (cons fst angs)))))
  ))

(fn [words]
  (let [words-bigset (set words)]
    (loop [remaining-words words-bigset
           anagrams #{}]
      (if (empty? remaining-words)
        anagrams
        (let [anas (filter #(= (set (first remaining-words)) (set %)) (rest remaining-words))
              rems (remove #(= (set (first remaining-words)) (set %)) (rest remaining-words))
              anas-incl-first (when (not-empty anas)
                                (conj anas (first remaining-words)))
              updated-anagrams (if (not-empty anas)
                                 (conj anagrams (set anas-incl-first))
                                 anagrams)]
          (recur rems updated-anagrams))))))

        anagram? #(= (sort-str %1) (sort-str %2))

(fn collect-anagrams [coll]
  (let [anagram? (fn [x y] (= (frequencies x) (frequencies y)))
        impl (fn [coll acc]
               (if (empty? coll)
                 acc
                 (let [current (first coll)
                       anagram-map (group-by #(anagram? current %) (rest coll))]
                   (recur (get anagram-map false) (conj acc (into #{current} (get anagram-map true))))
                   )))]
    (set (filter #(>= (count %) 2) (impl coll [])))))

(fn [words]
  (->> words
       (group-by #(set %))                                  ;; group them by a set made of their letters
       vals                                                 ;; take the values from the map
       (filter #(>= (count %) 2))                           ;; Skip any ones that don't have more than two matches
       (map set)                                            ;; Lists to sets
       set))                                                ;; Produce a set of sets

(fn [words]
  (loop [anagrams #{}
		 [word & more-words] words]
    (letfn [(letter-set [w] (apply hash-set (distinct (clojure.string/split w #""))))
            (anagrams? [& wds] (and (apply = (map count wds)) (apply = (map letter-set wds))))]
      (let [ans (apply hash-set (filter #(anagrams? word %) more-words))]
        (if (empty? ans)
          (if (first more-words)
            (recur anagrams more-words)
			anagrams)
          (if (first more-words)
            (recur (conj anagrams (conj ans word)) (remove #(contains? ans %) more-words))
            (conj anagrams (conj ans word))))))))

(fn anagram-finder [words]
  (let [word-map
        (reduce (fn [ret word]
                     (let [key (-> word
                                   sort
                                   clojure.string/join)
                           anagrams (get ret key #{})]
                       (assoc ret key (conj anagrams word))))
                {}
                words)]
   (->> word-map
         vals
         (filter #(< 1 (count %)))
         set)))

#(letfn [(count-elements
          ([s] (count-elements s {}))
          ([s h] (if (empty? s)
                   h
                   (recur (rest s)
                          (assoc h
                            (first s)
                            (if (h (first s))
                              (inc (h (first s)))
                              1))))))
         (anagram? [a b]
                   (and (= (count a) (count b))
                        (= (count-elements a) (count-elements b))))]
   (loop [s %
          anagrams #{}]
     (if (empty? s)
       anagrams
       (recur (remove (partial anagram? (first s)) s)
              (let [a (filter (partial anagram? (first s)) s)]
                (if (= (count a) 1)
                  anagrams
                  (conj anagrams (into #{} a))))))))

  (->>

(letfn [(map-amounts
          ;; Return a map representing the amounts of each element in coll.
          ([coll]
             (map-amounts {} coll))
          ([map coll]
             (if (empty? coll)
               map
               (recur (assoc map
                        (first coll)
                        (inc (get map (first coll) 0)))
                      (rest coll)))))
        (same-elements? [vec1 vec2]
          ;; Return true if vec1 and vec2 contains the same elements and the same amount of elements (not necessarily in the same order).
          (= (map-amounts vec1) (map-amounts vec2)))
        (anagram? [w1 w2]
          ;; Check if word w1 is an anagram of word w2.
          (same-elements? (vec w1) (vec w2)))

        (anagrams-of [word words]
          ;; Return a set of all anagrams of word in words (including word itself).
          (conj (set (filter (partial anagram? word) words)) word))

        (all-anagrams [words]
          ;; Return a set of sets of all anagrams in words.
          (set (filter #(next %1) (map #(anagrams-of %1 words) words))))]
  all-anagrams)

                       (update-in acc [char] (fnil inc 0)))
                     {}
                     s))]
    (->> (set %)
         (reduce (fn [acc item]
               (let [item-chars (chars-map item)]
                 (update-in acc [item-chars]
                            (fnil (fn [old] (conj old item))
                                  #{item}))))
             {})
         vals
         (filter (comp (partial < 1) count))
         set))

(fn [ls] (loop [w (first ls) s (rest ls) res #{}]
             (if (empty? s) res
                 (recur (first s) (rest s)
                        (let [v (filter #(= (sort w) (sort %)) (rest s))]
                          (if (empty? v) res
                              (conj res (set (conj v w)))))))))

      (set sets-of-anagrams))))

            (vals (group-by count words)))))))
  )

(fn[words]
        (let [pairs
              (fn [a]
                (for [xa a xb a 
                      :let [sxa (sort xa)
                            sxb (sort xb)]
                      :when (and (not (= xa xb))
                                 (= sxa sxb))] [sxa [xa xb]]))
              ->map
              (fn[coll]
                (loop [[head & more] coll
                       map {}]
                  (if (nil? head)
                    map
                    (let [[key [fst snd]] head]
                      (recur more
                             (assoc map key (conj (get map key #{}) fst snd)))))))]
          
          (set (vals (->map (pairs words))))))

(let [take1 (fn [p]
              (map (fn [[pre post]]
                     [(first post) (concat pre (rest post))])
                   (map (fn [i] (split-at i p)) (range (count p)))))
      perm (fn perm [p]
             (if (empty? p)
               '(())
               (reduce #(lazy-cat %1 %2) '()
                       (map (fn [[h q]]
                              (map (partial cons h) (perm q)))
                            (take1 p)))))
      str-perm (fn [s] (set (map (fn [cls] (apply str cls)) (perm s))))
      potential-anagrams (fn [s]
                           (reduce
                            (fn [r st]
                              (if (some #(% st) r)
                                r
                                (conj r (str-perm st))))
                            #{}
                            s))]
  (fn [s] (let [s (set s)] ((comp set filter)
                            (comp not (partial = 1) count)
                            (map
                             (fn [pas]
                               (clojure.set/intersection pas s))
                             (potential-anagrams s))))))

(fn anagram [xcoll]
  (set (filter #(> (count %1) 1)
               (vals (loop [coll xcoll
                            newmap {}]
                       (if (empty? coll)
                         newmap
                         (recur (next coll) (let [element (first coll)
                                                  mapkey (clojure.string/join (sort element))
                                                  mapval (newmap mapkey)]
                                              (if (contains? newmap mapkey)
                                                (assoc newmap mapkey (conj mapval element))
                                                (assoc newmap mapkey #{element}))))))))))

          (make-anagrams [words]

                           (filter #(> (count %) 1) distincts)))]

  [s]
  (->>
    (loop [d {}
           s (seq s)]
      (if s
        (let [k (sort (seq (first s)))]
          (recur (assoc d k (conj (d k []) (first s)))

    (filter #(> (count (second %)) 1))

(fn anagram-finder [c]
  (if (empty? c)
    #{}
    (let [anagram? #(= (set %1) (set (first c)))
          as (reduce #(if (anagram? %2) (conj %1 %2) %1) #{} c)]
      (if (second as)
        (conj (anagram-finder (apply disj (set c) as)) as)
        (anagram-finder (apply disj (set c) as))))))

(fn solve
  ([v]
   (solve v {}))
  
  ([v ans]
   (if (empty? v)
     (set (filter #(<= 2 (count %)) (vals ans)))
     (let [fs (first v)
           sgn (sort fs)
           assc (conj (get ans sgn #{}) fs)]
       (solve (rest v)
              (assoc ans
                sgn assc
                ))
       )
     )))

(fn [words]
    (let [reverses (map #(hash-map (apply hash-set (distinct (seq %))) #{%}) words)
          rev-map (apply merge-with concat reverses)
          rev-map (filter #(> (count %) 1) (vals rev-map))
          rev-map (apply hash-set (map #(apply hash-set %) rev-map))]
      rev-map))

(fn get-anagrams [v]
  (loop [anagrams {}
         [word & morewords] v]
    (if (nil? word)
      (apply hash-set (filter #(> (count %) 1) (vals anagrams)))
      (let [k (sort word)
            k-set (or (get anagrams k) #{})]
        (recur
         	(assoc anagrams k (conj k-set word))
         	morewords)))))

        seqs (map toseq coll)
        counted (reduce (fn[acc el] (update-in acc [el] (fnil inc 0))) {} seqs)
        filtered (filter #(> (second %) 1) counted)
        tocount (fn[s] (< 1 (get counted (toseq s) 0)))

  ]
 (set(map (fn[el] (matchitem el coll) ) (keys filtered)))
  )
)

(fn find [words]
  (set
   (map (fn find-1 [[k v]] (set v))
        (filter (fn find-2 [[k v]] (< 1 (count v)))
                ((fn find-3 [words coll]
                   (if (empty? words)
                     coll
                     (let [word (first words)
                           words (rest words)]
                       (if (coll (set word))
                         (recur words (merge-with concat {(set word) [word]} coll))
                         (recur words (assoc coll (set word) [word]))))))
      	         words {})))))

(fn anagram-finder [coll]
  (letfn [(stored? [this in-here]
            (some #(% this) in-here))
          (get-anagrams [like-this from-here]
            (let [anagrams (set (filter 
                                   #(anagram? like-this %) 
                                   from-here))]
              (if (> (count anagrams) 1)
                anagrams)))
          (anagram? [this that]
           (let [this (sort (seq this))
                  that (sort (seq that))]
             (if (= this that) true false)))]
    (loop [current (first coll)
           remaining coll
           so-far #{}]
      (println current remaining so-far)
      (if (empty? remaining)
        so-far
        (if (or (stored? current so-far)
                (nil? (get-anagrams current remaining)))
          (recur (first (rest remaining))
                 (rest remaining)
                 so-far)
          (recur (first (rest remaining))
                 (rest remaining)
                 (conj so-far (get-anagrams current remaining))))))))

(fn [words] (let [anagram? (fn [s1 s2]
                  (= (sort s1) (sort s2)))]
   (loop [acc #{} pool (set words)]
     (if (empty? pool) acc
      (let [angs   (set (filter #(anagram? (first pool) %) pool))
            others (clojure.set/difference pool angs)]
        (if (> (count angs) 1)
          (recur (conj acc angs) others)
          (recur acc others)))))))

   (set
    (filter #(> (count %) 1)
            (distinct
             (map
              (fn setify [element]
                (reduce
                 (fn subsetify [result actual]
                   (println element actual (clojure.set/difference (set element) (set actual)))
                   (if
                    (and
                     (= (count (clojure.set/difference (set actual) (set element))) 0)
                     (= (count (clojure.set/difference (set element) (set actual))) 0))
                     (conj result actual);;( clojure.set/intersection (set element ) (set actual ) ) )
                     result))
                 #{}

(fn [words]
               (letfn [(toLetterMap [word] (reduce (fn [result char]
                                                     (if (nil? (get result char))
                                                       (conj result [char 1])
                                                       (conj result [char (+ (get result char) 1)])))
                                                   {} (seq word)))
                       (areAnagrams [a b] (= (toLetterMap a) (toLetterMap b)))]
                 (set (vals (reduce (fn [result [a b]]
                           (if (areAnagrams a b)
                             (let [key (toLetterMap a)
                                   existing (get result key)]
                               (if (nil? existing)
                                 (conj result [key #{a b}])
                                 (conj result [key (conj existing a b)])
                                 )
                               )
                             result
                           )) {} (for [a words b words :when (not= a b)] [a b]))))
                 )
               )

(fn find-anagrams-4clojure
  ([x]
    (find-anagrams-4clojure (rest x) (rest x) (sorted-set (first x)) #{}))
  ([candidates current-candidates current-final final]
    (let [are-anagram (fn [x y] (if (= 0 (count x) (count y))
    true
    (if-not (= (count x) (count y))
      false
      (if (= (first x) (first y))
        (recur (disj x (first x)) (disj y (first y)))
        false))))
          separate-letter (fn [x]   (set (re-seq #"[a-z]" x)))
          release-from (fn [x y z] (if (= 0 (count x))
    z
    (if (= (last x) y)
      (recur (butlast x) y z)
      (recur (butlast x) y (conj z (last x))))))]
    (if (= 0 (count candidates))
      (if (> (count current-final) 1)
        (conj final current-final) final)
      (if (= 0 (count current-candidates))
        (if (> (count current-final) 1)
          (recur (rest candidates) (rest candidates) (sorted-set (first candidates)) (conj final current-final))
          (recur (rest candidates) (rest candidates) (sorted-set (first candidates)) final))
        (if (are-anagram (separate-letter (first current-candidates)) (separate-letter (first current-final)))
           (recur (release-from candidates (first current-candidates) '()) (rest current-candidates) (conj current-final (first current-candidates)) final)
          (recur candidates (rest current-candidates) current-final final)))))))

                               true false))
        add-word (fn [set word]
                   (if (is-word-anagram (first set) word)
                     (conj set word)
                     set))
        add-anagram (fn [sets word]
                      (if (contains-anagram sets word)
                        (map #(add-word % word) sets)
                        (conj sets #{word})))]

    (loop [ret #{}
           words words]
      (if (empty? words)
        (set (remove #(= (count %) 1) ret))
        (recur
         (add-anagram ret (first words))
         (rest words))))))

(fn anagram-subsets [sqn]
  (loop [[word & others] sqn
         anagram-sets {}]
    (if (nil? word)
      ;; no words left, compile all the anagram sets. Ignore those of length 1.
      (->> anagram-sets
           (vals)
           (filter #(> (count %) 1))
           (map set)
           (set))
      ;; if there are words left, insert the next word into the catalog.
      (recur others
             (update-in anagram-sets 
                        [(set word)] 
                        #(conj % word))))))

  (loop [anagrams #{}
         remwords words]
    (if (empty? remwords)
      (set (filter #(not= #{} %) anagrams))
      (let [current-word (first remwords)
            is-anagram? (fn [x] (and 
                                     (= (count x) (count current-word))
                                     (= (set x) (set current-word))))
            ac (set (filter is-anagram? remwords))
            new-anagrams (if (not= ac #{current-word})
                           ac
                           #{})
            rest-words (filter (complement new-anagrams) (rest remwords))]
      (recur (conj anagrams new-anagrams) rest-words)))))

             (if (empty? strs)

          (g [[x & xs] acc]
             (loop [[y & ys] xs
                    can      #{}]
               (if y
                 (if (and (= (count x)
          					 (count y))
       					  (= (sort x)
          				     (sort y)))
                   (recur ys (conj can y))
                   (recur ys can))

                   #(f xs acc)
                   #(f (remove can xs)
                       (conj acc (conj can x)))))))]
    (trampoline f strs #{})))

              (let [f (fn [s]
                       (mapcat (fn [x] (for [y (range n) :when (nil? ((set x) y))] (conj x y))) s))]
                (loop [s (for [j (range n)] [j])
                       i (- n 1)]
                  (if (> i 0)
                    (recur (f  s) (dec i))
                    s ))))
        perms-m (memoize perms) 
    ]
    (loop [acc #{} word (first s) s1 (rest s)]
     (if (nil? word)
       (set (filter (fn [x] (> (count x) 1)) acc))  
       (recur (if (= (.indexOf (mapcat seq acc) word) -1)
                (conj acc (set (filter (set s) (map (partial words word) (perms-m (count word)))))) 
                acc)
                (first s1)
                (rest s1))))))

(fn anagram-finder [s]
  (loop [word (first s)
         others (rest s)
         acc #{}]
    (if (empty? others)
      acc
      (let [matches (filter #(= (sort word) (sort %)) others)
            others (remove (fn [i] (some #(= i %) matches)) others)]
        ;; if we have matches, remove them from others and recur
        (cond
         (empty? matches) (recur (first others)
                                 (rest others)
                                 acc)
         :else (recur (first others)
                      (rest others)
                      (conj acc (set (cons word matches)))))))))

(fn anagram-finder [words]
  ;; (trace "ANAGRAM-FINDER")
  ;; iterate over words
  (reduce
   (fn [acc word]
     ;; get all the other words
     (let [other-words (filter (fn [w] (not (= word w))) words)
           includes? (fn [w c]
                       (reduce (fn [acc ch]
                                 (cond (= ch c) true
                                       :else acc)) false w))
           subset (reduce
                   (fn [acc other-word]
                     ;; (debug "Other-word: " other-word)
                     (let [filtered-word (doall (apply str (filter (fn [c] (includes? word c)) other-word)))
                           anagram? (and (= filtered-word other-word) (= (count other-word) (count word)))]
                       ;; (debug "filtered-word: " filtered-word)
                       ;; (debug "Anagram?: " anagram?)
                       (cond anagram? (conj acc filtered-word word)
                             :else acc
                             ))) #{} other-words)]
       ;; (println "")
       ;; (debug "Acc: " acc)
       ;; (debug "Words: " words)
       ;; (debug "Other-words: " other-words)
       ;; (debug "Word: " word)
       ;; (debug "Subset: " subset)
       (cond (not (empty? subset)) (conj acc subset)
             :else acc
     ))) #{} words)
  )

(fn find-them-all [xs]
  (letfn [(permutation? [s1 s2]
            (let [c1 (count s1)
                  c2 (count s2)
                  f (comp (partial group-by identity)
                          (partial map str)
                          seq)]
              (cond
                (not (= c1 c2)) false
                (zero? c1) true
                :else (= (f s1) (f s2)))))
          (find-anagram [e xs]
            (let [a (into #{e} ((group-by (partial permutation? e) xs) true))]
              (if (> (count a) 1)
                a
                nil)))]
    (set (remove nil? (reduce #(into %1 [(find-anagram %2 xs)]) #{} xs)))))

(fn [coll]
  (let [anagram? (fn [w1 w2]
                   (every? (into #{} (re-seq #"\S" w2)) (re-seq #"\S" w1)))
	      anagrams (fn anagrams [coll]
		               (into #{} (filter (partial anagram? (first coll)) coll)))]
	  (loop [c coll s (into #{} coll) res #{}]
	    (let [as (anagrams c)	        
	          remc (into [] (clojure.set/difference s (clojure.set/union as (reduce clojure.set/union res))))]

		        res
		        (recur remc s (conj res as)))))))

(fn find-anagrams [sos]
  (letfn [(get-anagrams-to-w [w c]
            (loop [head w cur-group #{} remaining c]
              (if (seq remaining)
                (if (= (set (seq head)) (set (seq (first remaining)))) 
                  (recur head (conj cur-group (first remaining)) (rest remaining))
                  (recur head cur-group (rest remaining)))
                (conj cur-group head))))]
    (loop [tail sos all-groups #{}]
      (let [head (first tail)]
        (if (nil? head)
          (set (filter #(> (count %) 1) all-groups))
          (let [next-group (get-anagrams-to-w head (rest tail))] 
            (recur (clojure.set/difference (set (rest tail)) next-group) (conj all-groups next-group))))))))

    (if (empty? (rest sekv)) #{}
        (let [ana (set (keys (filter (fil (first pama)) pama)))

        (if (< 1 (count ana))

          (anabed ost)
          )))))

(fn anagram-finder-solution
  [args] ;; update args as needed
  ;; Write a function which finds all the anagrams in a vector of words. A word x is an anagram of word y if all the letters in x can be rearranged in a different order to form y. Your function should return a set of sets, where each sub-set is a group of words which are anagrams of each other. Each sub-set should have at least two words. Words without any anagrams should not be included in the result.
   (set (map set (filter #(> (count %1) 1) (vals (group-by sort args)))))
  )

(fn anagrams
  [strs]
  (loop [[h & t] strs
         sorted-to-words {}]
    (let [sorted-h (sort h)]
       (let [new-sorted-to-words (if (contains? sorted-to-words sorted-h)
                                  (assoc sorted-to-words sorted-h
                                     (conj (sorted-to-words sorted-h) h))
                                  (assoc sorted-to-words sorted-h [h]))]
         (if (nil? t)
           (into #{} (filter #(> (count %) 1)
                             (map (fn [[x y]] (into #{} y)) new-sorted-to-words)))
             (recur t new-sorted-to-words))))))
